A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Ok First and foremost I am a Star Wars Fan. I saw this film TWICE in 24 hours. Reason for this because the first viewing I was taken back by all the \"NEW\" things characters did and I wasn't sure if I liked it. BUT after the second viewing I was in LOVE with this film. Acting was GREAT and it just added to the Star Wars universe. Last Jedi is in my TOP 2 Star Wars films of all time. This film also had a beautiful send off Too Carrie Fisher.
